pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a dramatic, wide-angle view of a powerful storm over a vast, flat grassland. The sky is dominated by dark, turbulent clouds with striking shades of teal and gray, while hints of light touch their upper edges. In the distance, a curtain of heavy rain falls onto the plains. The scene captures the slow, powerful movement of the storm system.
